>>> 运算符

Cosine's Blog

# >>> 运算符

var len = this.length >>> 0;

I have never seen >>> used in JavaScript before. What is it and what does it do?

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1822350/what-is-the-javascript-operator-and-how-do-you-use-it

1>>>0            === 1
-1>>>0           === 0xFFFFFFFF          -1>>0    === -1
1.7>>>0          === 1
0x100000002>>>0  === 2
1e21>>>0         === 0xDEA00000          1e21>>0  === -0x21600000
Infinity>>>0     === 0
NaN>>>0          === 0
null>>>0         === 0
'1'>>>0          === 1
'x'>>>0          === 0
Object>>>0       === 0
Last Updated: 1/27/2020, 12:22:25 AM
